Key Match Events: Indiana broke a 56-all halftime tie with the first five points of the second half
Used a pivotal 40-point third quarter to seize control
Capped its big third quarter with a late 12-5 run that extended an eight-point lead to 96-82
Post-Match Reflections: Indiana has finally started playing the way it envisioned over these past 11 games. Haliburton is in sync, the defense has improved and the Pacers have won eight times during that span to reach.500.
